Package hw9

Class EnemyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw9.EnemyManager
  • public class EnemyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes care of the obstacles in the game Adds a cactus or 3 cacti to an arrayList This is implemented using Random
    Author:
    royar

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Drawing each obstacle
      private Cactus getRandomCactus()
      Method for returning a cactus or cacti with random.nextBoolean()
      void resetGame()
      Method for resetting the obstacle parameters The list is cleared and one cactus is added in case of game replay
      void update()
      Method for updating the score, coordinates of the obstacles Also, checks if the character collides with the obstacle This method also adds cacti if they go outside the game screen
